heading: HB06464
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING SPECIALTY HEALTH CARE UNITS (SHCUs) ATTACHED TO EXISTING REGIONAL HOSPITALS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title:
Intends To Address The Problem Of Specialty Hospitals Being Operationally But Geographically Situated In Metro Manila, Rendering Majority Of Filipinos The Lack Of Access To Health Care; And An Additional Burden For Transportation And Accommodation Expenses For Those Who Can Avail The Services Of These Manila-based Hospitals.
Aims To Bridge The Existing Huge Disparity Of Accessibility To Specific Health Care Services To Address The Medical Needs Of Patients With Diseases Of A Particular Organ Or Group Of Organs, And The Health Care Need By A Particular Group, Such As Children, Women, Or The Elderly.
Proposes For A Ten (10) Year Specialty Health Care Units Development Plan That Will Identify The Establishment Of Shcus Attached To Existing Doh-regional Hospitals.
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2020-03-09
